sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-app-bar app color="indigo" dark elevate="4">
      <v-toolbar-title>MyApp</v-toolbar-title>
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
      <v-btn text @click="onClick">Click</v-btn>
      <v-btn text @click="onLogin">Login</v-btn>
      <v-btn text @click="onRegister">Register</v-btn>
      <v-menu offset-y>
        <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
          <v-btn text v-bind="attrs" v-on="on">Menu</v-btn>
        </template>
        <v-list>
          <v-list-item>
            <v-list-item-title>Profile</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>
          <v-list-item>
            <v-list-item-title>Settings</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>
          <v-list-item>
            <v-list-item-title>Help</v-list-item-title>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-menu>
    </v-app-bar>
    <v-main>
      <HelloWorld />
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import HelloWorld from './components/HelloWorld.vue'

export default {
  name: 'App',

  components: {
    HelloWorld,
  },

  methods: {
    onClick() {
      alert('Button Clicked');
    },
    onLogin() {
      alert('Login Clicked');
    },
    onRegister() {
      alert('Register Clicked');
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>
.v-app-bar {
  box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}
</style>
